TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23OFPI-PROD-LDAPSELECT b.component_name, c.parameter_name, a.parameter_value FROM apps.fnd_svc_comp_param_vals a, apps.fnd_svc_components b, apps.fnd_svc_comp_params_b c WHERE b.component_id = a.component_id AND b.component_type = c.component_type AND c.parameter_id = a.parameter_id AND c.encrypted_flag = 'N' AND regexp_like (b.component_name, '(Mailer)|(HU)','i') -- AND c.parameter_name in ('OUTBOUND_SERVER', 'REPLYTO') ORDER BY c.parameter_name
